definition: cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)

sentences.english: It is a preferred addictive for preparing over-based marine cylinder oil.
sentences.chinese: 是調製高鹼值船用汽缸油的首選添加劑。

sentences.english: Eachindependent cylinder's press-roller has precision micro-adjuster to guarantee the effect of sueding .
sentences.chinese: 每支獨立汽缸壓布輥精確的微調，能確保磨毛效果。

sentences.english: The flywheels of some engines also carry marks indicating the serial numbers of the cylinders where the compression occurs.
sentences.chinese: 有些發動機的飛輪標有在壓縮行程的汽缸序號。

sentences.english: Cylinder sleeves, camshafts and piston pins can be coated with the new method.
sentences.chinese: 新塗層工藝適用於汽缸套，凸輪軸和活塞銷。

sentences.english: Alignment of bottom casing and bearing seating.
Its cylinder was just an old piece of gas-pipe.
sentences.chinese: 這臺引擎的汽缸是用一截煤氣管改成的。

sentences.english: This paper is a companion volume of "The wear failure analysis of phosphorus cast iron cylinder".
sentences.chinese: 本文是“高磷鑄鐵汽缸套磨損失效分析”的姊妹篇。

sentences.english: Caulk or grouting needed in tub area.
sentences.chinese: 需要爲汽缸做灌漿或防漏。

sentences.english: The plume may extend into the cylinder bore a distance corresponding to the piston position.
sentences.chinese: 羽流可延伸到汽缸膛中對應於活塞位置的一段距離。

sentences.english: Initial skin bore of cylinders on location.
sentences.chinese: 開始加固內鏜在汽缸上在這位置。

sentences.english: Thermal stresses in a turbine casing are important for safety operation.
sentences.chinese: 汽缸的熱應力，對汽輪機的運行安全很重要。

sentences.english: The piston is reciprocating inside cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 活塞在汽缸內部往復運動。

sentences.english: Cylinders six and eight came up weak on a cylinder balance.
sentences.chinese: 做汽缸平衡時，發現第六缸和第八缸偏弱。

sentences.english: It's a 1992 Mustang V6, two-door automatic.
sentences.chinese: 那是部1992年野馬六汽缸雙門自動波車。

sentences.english: Move dial gauge to cylinder liner record reading on dial gauge.
sentences.chinese: 移動針盤量規到汽缸套，記錄針盤量規上讀數。

sentences.english: It can be remote controlled for cylinder , FRL , solenoid , etc .
sentences.chinese: 汽缸配三連件，電磁閥，等配件可實現遠程控制。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
